COMMAND_ERROR: Something went wrong with the {0} command.
COMMAND_SUCCESS: The {0} command has been successfully executed.
ADD_DEPENDENCIES_ADDED: Dependencies added to the manifest file.
ADD_DEPENDENCIES_ADDED_LOG: The following dependencies have been added to the manifest file:
ADD_DEPENDENCIES_EMPTY: There are no dependencies to add to the manifest file.
ADD_DEPENDENCIES_ERROR: There was an error when adding missing dependencies to the manifest file.
DEPLOY_QUESTIONS_ACCOUNT_SPECIFIC_VALUES: What do you want to do if the project contains account-specific values?
DEPLOY_QUESTIONS_APPLY_INSTALLATION_PREF: Do you want to apply installation preferences?
DEPLOY_QUESTIONS_CHOICES_ACCOUNT_SPECIFI: Display a warning and continue the deployment process
UPLOAD_FILE_OVERWRITE_FILE: The {0} file will be overwritten in the File Cabinet. Do you want to continue?
UPLOAD_FILE_PROCESS_CANCELED: The file upload process has been canceled. No files have been overwritten.
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_CREATE_NEW: New authentication ID (authID, custom alias you give to a specific account-role combination)
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_CREATE_CONTINUE_IN_BROWS: Continue the authentication process in the prompted browser.
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_ENTER_URL: Press Enter to use the production domain 'system.netsuite.com', or enter your custom domain.
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_CREATE_SAVE_TOKEN_OPTION: Save a TBA token issued in NetSuite
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_ERROR_NOT_IN_PROJECT: Can't set the default authentication ID (authID) if not in a project.
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_LOADING: Loading the configured authentication IDs (authID) in this machine...
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_CANCELED: The creation of a new authentication ID (authID) has been canceled.
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_SELECT_CREATE: Select or create an authentication ID (authID). It will be set up as default:
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_SELECT_AUTH_ID_SUCCESS: The default account for the current project was successfully set to {0}.
MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_CREATE_SAVE_TOKEN_NEW_TB: The TBA token has been saved for the following company and role: {0} [{1}]. This project will use the authentication ID {2} as default.
UPDATE_OBJECT_OVERRIDE: The {0} object will be overwritten with the object from the account. Do you want to continue?
UPDATE_OBJECT_PROCESS_CANCELED: The custom object update process has been canceled. No custom objects have been overwritten.
UPDATE_OBJECT_ERROR: The {0} object was not updated from the account to your project.
UPDATE_OBJECT_SUCCESS: The custom object in the project has been successfully updated with the account object.
ERRORS_NO_ACTIVE_FILE: There was an error. You must have an active file to perform this action.
ERRORS_NO_ACTIVE_WORKSPACE: There was an error. The current file does not belong to any workspace.
ERRORS_NO_ACTIVE_FILE_OR_WORKSPACE: There is no active file or the active file is not in a workspace.
ERRORS_SDK_JAVA_VERSION_NOT_COMPATIBLE: Your Java version {0} is not compatible with SuiteCloud Extension for Visual Studio Code. Install Oracle JDK version {1}.
ERRORS_SDK_JAVA_VERSION_NOT_INSTALLED: Java is not installed on this machine. Install Oracle JDK version {0} to run SuiteCloud Extension for Visual Studio Code.
EXTENSION_INSTALLATION_ERROR_SDK_NOT_AVA: The JAR file is not available from this URL.
